			            Treatment Options for Parathyroid Cancer
			            
			                
			                    Localized Parathyroid Cancer
			                    Treatment of localized parathyroid cancer may include the following:         -  Surgery (en bloc resection).    - Surgery followed by radiation therapy.    - Radiation therapy.    -  Supportive care to treat hypercalcemia (too much calcium in the blood).
